AI Response.description: A flavorful and hearty pizza topped with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and cilantro.
AI Response.imagePrompt: A delicious BBQ Chicken Pizza fresh out of the oven, topped with melted cheese and vibrant cilantro.
steps: Roll out the pizza dough onto a baking sheet.
Spread BBQ sauce over the dough, leaving a small border for the crust.
Top with grilled chicken, red onion slices, and mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted.
Remove from the oven and sprinkle with chopped cilantro.
Slice and serve hot. Enjoy your BBQ Chicken Pizza!
